title: Ticket #6601: Package test_user_mapping
description:
John Thiltges wrote: "I'd been working on some changes to our condor_mapfile and wanted to test the DN mappings. After quite a bit of searching, I stumbled across this: https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/blob/master/src/condor_utils/test_user_mapping.cpp It seems really handy: 
[root@red ~]# /tmp/test_user_mapping -method GSI -file /etc/condor/condor_mapfile -user /CN=red-c1234.unl.edu
red-c1234@worker.unl.edu
This would be a nice addition to the condor-test package, if possible. (Building it would probably require BUILD_TEST=true and running a make tests)"
check_ins: 2018-Sep-29 19:19   Check-in [55498]: (#6601) Package test_user_mapping (By Tim Theisen )
creator: tim
